name: Noise-Robust Speech Recognition
description: Evaluates ASR performance under various noise conditions typical in real-world environments (traffic, office, machinery, etc.).
test_method: Add calibrated noise (babble, traffic, machinery) at various SNR levels. Measure WER degradation compared to clean conditions.
notes: Automotive scenarios typically involve 10-20dB SNR with engine and road noise. Should test with domain-specific noise profiles.
